endpoints.description: Get all art requests or filter by query parameters
Get a specific art request by ID
Update an art request by ID
Delete an art request by ID
Get all art invoices or filter by query parameters
Get a specific art invoice by ID
Update an art invoice by ID
Delete an art invoice by ID
GET /api/design-notes - List all design notes with filtering
GET /api/design-notes/:id - Get single design note by Note_ID
Optimized endpoint that combines product, pricing, and DTG data in a single request
POST /api/files/upload Upload a file directly to Caspio Files API Expects multipart/form-data with a 'file' field
GET /api/files/:externalKey Retrieve a file from Caspio by its ExternalKey
GET /api/files/:externalKey/info Get file metadata without downloading the file
DELETE /api/files/:externalKey Delete a file from Caspio
POST /api/files/upload Upload a file from base64 data to Caspio Files API Now uses shared upload service for consistency
GET /api/files/:externalKey Retrieve a file from Caspio by its ExternalKey
GET /api/files/:externalKey/info Get file metadata without downloading the file
DELETE /api/files/:externalKey Delete a file from Caspio
POST /api/quote-items-with-file Create a quote item with optional file upload If ImageUpload field contains base64 data, uploads file first

GET /api/gift-certificates  Query gift certificates with optional filters. When certificateNumber is provided, returns single certificate with resolved ShopWorks order IDs. Otherwise returns array of matching certificates.

GET /api/gift-certificates/by-order/:orderId  Reverse lookup: Find gift certificates used on a specific ShopWorks order. Takes ShopWorks order ID, finds external order ID, then searches gift certificate history.
DELETE /api/gift-certificates/clear  Delete ALL records from the Inksoft_Gift_Certificates table. WARNING: This is a destructive operation - use with caution!
POST /api/gift-certificates/bulk  Bulk insert gift certificate records. Caspio supports up to 1000 records per insert request.

GET /api/jds/products/:sku  Get details for a single product by SKU  URL Parameters: - sku: Product SKU (e.g., "LPB004")  Query Parameters: - refresh (boolean): Force cache refresh (default: false)  Response: { "result": {...product...}, "cached": false }  Returns 404 if product not found

GET /api/jds/health  Health check endpoint for monitoring  Response: { "status": "healthy", "service": "JDS Industries API", "timestamp": "2025-11-06T10:30:00Z", "config": { "cacheEnabled": true, "cacheDuration": "1 hour", "rateLimit": "60 req/min" }, "endpoints": {...} }

GET /api/manageorders/orders/verify/:extOrderId  Verify that an order was received by ManageOrders  Parameters: extOrderId - External order ID (e.g., "NWCA-12345")  Response: { "success": true, "found": true, "extOrderId": "NWCA-12345", "uploadedAt": "2025-10-27", "orderData": {...} }
POST /api/manageorders/auth/test  Test authentication with ManageOrders PUSH API  Response: { "success": true, "message": "Authentication successful", "tokenExpires": "2025-10-27T11:30:00Z" }
GET /api/manageorders/push/health  Health check endpoint for PUSH API functionality

GET /api/manageorders/customers  Fetches unique customers from ManageOrders based on orders from the last 60 days.  Query Parameters: - refresh (boolean): Force refresh of cached data (default: false)  Response: { "customers": [...], "cached": true/false, "cacheDate": "2025-10-26", "count": 383 }
GET /api/manageorders/cache-info  Returns information about the current cache state (for debugging).
GET /api/manageorders/orders  Fetches orders by date range with multiple date filter options. Supports: date_Ordered, date_Invoiced, date_RequestedToShip, date_Produced, date_Shipped
GET /api/manageorders/orders/:order_no  Fetches a specific order by order number.
GET /api/manageorders/getorderno/:ext_order_id  Gets the ManageOrders order number from an external order ID.
GET /api/manageorders/lineitems/:order_no  Fetches line items for a specific order.
GET /api/manageorders/payments  Fetches payments by date range.
GET /api/manageorders/payments/:order_no  Fetches payments for a specific order.
GET /api/manageorders/tracking  Fetches tracking information by date range.
GET /api/manageorders/tracking/:order_no  Fetches tracking information for a specific order.
GET /api/manageorders/inventory-cache-stats  Returns detailed statistics about the inventory cache (for debugging).
POST /api/manageorders/inventory-cache-clear  Clears the entire inventory cache (for debugging/troubleshooting).
GET /api/manageorders/inventorylevels  Fetches inventory levels with optional filters. Supports: PartNumber, ColorRange, Color, SKU, VendorName, etc.
GET /api/health - Health check endpoint with comprehensive info

endpoints.description: GET /api/products/new Returns products marked as new (IsNew=1) Supports filtering by category, brand, and limit Cached for 5 minutes to reduce API calls  Query params: - limit: Maximum number of results (default: 20, max: 100) - category: Filter by category name - brand: Filter by brand name
POST /api/admin/products/add-isnew-field Creates the IsNew boolean field in the products table This endpoint is idempotent - if field already exists, returns success

POST /api/admin/products/mark-as-new Batch updates products to set IsNew=true based on style numbers  Request body: { "styles": ["EB120", "EB121", "EB122", ...] }  Response: { "success": true, "recordsAffected": 150, "styles": ["EB120", "EB121", ...], "styleCount": 15 }

POST /api/admin/products/clear-isnew Clear IsNew field from all products (set to false)  Purpose: Reset the IsNew field when too many products were incorrectly marked  Response: { success, message, recordsAffected }

POST /api/admin/products/add-istopseller-field Creates the IsTopSeller field in the Sanmar product table  This is a one-time setup endpoint that creates a YES/NO (boolean) field. It's idempotent - safe to call multiple times.  Response: { success, message, fieldName, alreadyExists? }
POST /api/admin/products/clear-istopseller Clear IsTopSeller field from all products (set to false)  Purpose: Reset the IsTopSeller field when you want to start fresh  Response: { success, message }

GET /api/products/topsellers Returns products marked as IsTopSeller=true  Query parameters: - limit: Number of products to return (default: 20, max: 100) - category: Filter by category (e.g., "T-Shirts") - brand: Filter by brand name (e.g., "Port & Company")  Response includes parameter-aware caching (5-minute TTL)

Primary mapping endpoint GET /api/sanmar-shopworks/mapping?styleNumber=PC61&color=Forest  Provides complete ShopWorks translation including: - SKU structure (which SKUs to create) - Size field mapping (which Size fields to populate) - Color translations (display name ‚Üí ShopWorks catalog name) - Pricing for each SKU
Helper endpoint: Get suffix mapping rules GET /api/sanmar-shopworks/suffix-mapping
Helper endpoint: Get color mapping for a style GET /api/sanmar-shopworks/color-mapping?styleNumber=PC61

ShopWorks import-ready format GET /api/sanmar-shopworks/import-format?styleNumber=PC850&color=Cardinal  Returns flat JSON array with one entry per SKU, ready for ShopWorks import Each entry includes all size fields with actual size values where enabled
GET /api/thumbnails/by-design/:designId Look up a design thumbnail by Design ID
PUT /api/thumbnails/:thumbnailId/external-key Update the ExternalKey for a thumbnail record
GET /api/thumbnails/top-sellers Get thumbnails for top-selling designs
GET /api/transfers/matrix - All quantity tiers for a size
